setting.time: Ancient Jerusalem, late afternoon after trial
setting.location: Private quarters in Roman palace, stone chamber with window
setting.weather: Harsh desert sun streaming through window opening

characters.appearance: Same Roman official, 40s, now alone, visibly distressed, holding head
characters.clothing: White toga with purple stripe, partially disheveled, sandals removed
characters.position: Seated on stone bench beside window, hunched forward
characters.action: Holding head in hands, occasionally looking out window with anguished expression

scene.mainElements: Sparse Roman quarters with stone walls, narrow window opening, simple furniture, oil lamp
scene.details: Rough limestone walls, stone window sill with bright sunlight streaming through, simple wooden chest, clay water pitcher and basin, Roman coins scattered on small table, toga draped over chair back, leather scrolls on shelf
scene.background: View through window shows Jerusalem cityscape, distant hills, harsh afternoon shadows
scene.atmosphere: Solitude and moral anguish in stark stone chamber, weight of difficult decision pressing down, bright desert light contrasting with inner darkness, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Medium shot from interior corner, capturing solitary figure and window light
composition.focus: Roman official's posture of defeat and moral struggle
composition.depth: Foreground: stone furniture and Roman personal items; middle ground: distressed figure in bright window light; background: Jerusalem landscape through window opening

colorPalette.usageNotes: Soft, dreamy colors that blend into each other

rendering.detailLevel: selective focus, some areas sharp, others dissolving
